posts.author: Brian Martin
posts.title: Why Is Christopher Nolan’s Film The Prestige Is Underrated?
posts.excerpt: Science fiction is concerned with the future. What will the technological advancements of the future decades look like? What will humanity's relationship with new technologies be like? And how far will we go to accomplish and capitalize on such breakthroughs? The Prestige, a film by Christopher Nolan released in 2006, plays with these great concerns.
